categories: Category:Articles with an excess of redlinks

nodes.text: La Veuve Noire was a roleplaying Gamemaster help in the French gaming magazine Avalon 2. It was written by Franck Vidal.

The scenario contains some internal inconsistencies, especially with the overall timeline of the Sylphe species. There is also many mistakes in names.
Since it was written before February 1991, many details are problematic towards recent EU.
